post.body: Congrats. I think Julie P may have called this before you announced. You'll have to ask her.
Thanks. I decided to the classes & I still have $ left over for the sunglasses.
In regards to gmail you can go to More Actions> Apply a label (you may have to create one first) and then select message >Archive.
It's in Texas. The first bout we ever saw. We were checking them out before starting the MN league.
Why does FullShot only want to grab part of my page even though I tell it to grab all?
Have my derby team photo 2nite. Supposed to dress funky. The irish attire I had to done in MN was easier. Me= Not funky.
I'm currently using a G4 Mac for my footrest that is an xmas present for my little bro. I need to find something softer.
'Adopting' a child for xmas thru a program. On his list of needs is underwear & socks. Made me cry to think a child wouldn't have that.
Why is that there is always everything going on at once or nothing going on?
I need to work on a usability report but I really just want to bake a carmel apple pie.
Trying to figure out what insurance plan makes the most sense gives me anxiety.
Whatever happened to shampoo bottles telling you to rinse and repeat?
Can't decide if I should spend the rest of my HSA money on prescription sunglasses or child birthing classes.
Got my sister in-law to start a family blog but after seeing the hand-foot-mouth disease pic: http://tinyurl.com/6o5sfd I'm reconsidering.
I need a mental health day and a pony. Not necessarily in that order.
Presenting an overview of Web Accessibility with Cathy McAdam at Refresh Detroit this evening: http://www.refresh-detroit.org/.
Managed to not step outside once yesterday. I don't think today will be a repeat.
90,000 frequent flyer miles this year and I still manage to forget a hairbrush when I travel.
I think I have fecal alcohol syndrome from cleaning sewage out of my basement twice yesterday.
Thankful to be home. Just narrowly escaped Paloma yesterday morning.
Going to get to witness my first hurricane. Was supposed to fly out tomorrow afternoon but the airport has been shut down until it passes.
They also asked if we were doctors and wanted our emergency contact information.
Off to MSP this afternoon for a holiday party & then back to Detroit tomorrow for a wedding. I think I'll just repurpose the same outfit.
Was the result funky or scary? http://tinyurl.com/6hnmkv
Apparently, Hilton can only guarantee you a king size bed if you email the right people (and give threats.)
Cont... his reply was that it would happen in Minneapolis too if the car industry were there. I'd like to think not.
Saw this on the news on the other night: http://twitpic.com/ra3p and screamed to BF that we're moving.
Ill. gov tried to sell Obama Senate seat- hilarious. Makes Detroit not look 'so' bad. My BF thought it was his actual chair being sold.
Worse xmas present ever: "Gov. Granholm (MI) bought 300 shares of stock of a Detroit-based carmaker for her 3 children for Christmas."
Sent beer to South Korea (illegally). A bottle broke in transit but no one's going to jail. Being pregnant & in jail would have sucked.
Found my xmas present. It's a bad habit from childhood that I can't break. Must find presents.
This this instead: Pg 2-make the fan photo larger: http://tinyurl.com/433cjm
Awesome. I made the New York Times: http://tinyurl.com/4u7sqx.
Drinking apple cider vinegar. Trying to get rid of a chest cold before I have to fly tomorrow. The internet told me to do it.
An online store I ordered scuba gear from last year is now sending me a scuba magazine-- smart, now I want more scuba gear.
For some reason my orange looks like a grapefruit inside.
Sick and wanting to go back to bed.
